sentences.en: " Where's the torn place? "" It's been invisibly mended. ”
sentences.cn: “ 哪儿破了? ” “ 天衣无缝,补好了.”

sentences.en: Breeze wafts yellow leave in the air, Autumn watches, closely , silently, invisibly.
sentences.cn: 风将黄叶吹散在空中, 秋天注视着, 密切地 、 悄然地、了无痕迹地.

sentences.en: Every movement or transition should be invisibly prepared by half - halt.
sentences.cn: 所有的动作都要以看不到的半减却来准备.

sentences.en: He had learnt how to melt invisibly into the background.
sentences.cn: 他已经学会如何退居幕后.

sentences.en: Run it invisibly, so you can catch, asas deter , problem coworkers, visitors, family members, or managers.
sentences.cn: 运行它看不见的, 所以,你们可以赶上, 以及阻止, 可以安然的问题, 旅客, 家庭成员, 或经理.

sentences.en: Slowly, invisibly, your death will come upon you.
sentences.cn: 慢慢的, 悄悄的, 死神将会来到你的面前.

sentences.en: Thus, the Environment Resource plays a very key role in Technology Innovation visibly or invisibly.
sentences.cn: 环境资源为人类生存和发展提供天然矿物原料和自然条件, 它有形或无形地参与技术创新的整个过程.

words.tran_cn: 无形的，看不见的；无形的；不显眼的，暗藏的
看不见；看不见的东西；难看见

trans.tran_cn: 看不见地，无形地，无形中
